subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|電圧|でんあつ}}: [[voltage]]
* {{ja-r|電気|でんき}}: [[electricity]]
* {{ja-r|電球|でんきゅう}}: [[light bulb]]
* {{ja-r|電子|でんし}}: [[electron]]
* {{ja-r|電磁界|でんじかい}}: [[electromagnetic]] [[field]]
* {{ja-r|電子計算機|でんし けいさんき}}: [[computer]]
* {{ja-r|電車|でんしゃ}}: [[electric]] [[train]]
* {{ja-r|電束|でんそく}}: [[electric flux]]
* {{ja-r|電卓|でんたく}}: [[electric]] [[calculator]]
* {{ja-r|電灯|でんとう}}: [[light]], [[lamp]]
* {{ja-r|電流|でんりゅう}}: [[electric]] [[current]]
* {{ja-r|電力|でんりょく}}: [[electric power]]
* {{ja-r|電話|でんわ}}: a [[telephone]]
* {{ja-r|発電|はつでん}}: [[electric]] [[power generation]]
* {{ja-r|雷電|らいでん}}: [[thunder]] and [[lightning]]
* {{ja-r|電撃|でんげき}}: [[shock]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|いなずま|yomi=k}}
Compound of {{compound|ja|いな|tr1=ina|t1=[[rice]] plant|つま|tr2=tsuma|t2=[[spouse]]|sort=いなずま}}. From an old folk belief that lightning joined with the rice plant to bring it to seed. {{rendaku2|tsuma|zuma|sort=いなずま}}

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|落%雷|らく%らい}}
* {{ja-r|稲%光|いな%びかり}}
